name: marwinxxii personal page
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body: # marwinxxii Hello, my name is Alexey and this is my personal page. I am a software developer interested mostly in mobile and web development. Here you can find some "projects" on which I was or currently working on. 1. [XMPPaste](http://xmppaste.appspot.com) - It's a simple web service for saving your pastes using any XMPP client (Jabber, GTalk, etc). (Development suspended) 2. [CCardStats - Credit card stats](http://marwinxxii.github.com/ccardstats/) - Simple application for Android to gather statistic about your credit card from SMS notifications. Currently supports Sberbank. [Source](https://github.com/marwinxxii/ccardstats) 3. [LastFMEventFinder](http://marwinxxii.github.com/LastFMEventFinder/) - A simple page for searching artists events on last.fm for specified period, city, country. [Source](https://github.com/marwinxxii/LastFMEventFinder) 4. [Mafia game](http://marwinxxii.github.com/Mafia-game/) - It's a simple page which can be usefull for whose who like to playing role game Mafia. It provides easy management of players and time spent. [Source](https://github.com/marwinxxii/Mafia-game) ![Screenshot](images/mafia-game.png) 5. [Music calendar](http://new.music-calendar.appspot.com/) - Service to stay notified about upcoming musical releases. Provides calendar, RSS and web API. (Development suspended) ![Screenshot](images/music-calendar.png) 6. [musicpie](http://marwin22.unet.ws/lastfm/musicpie/create.php) - Service for creating piechart with your music statistic from last.fm. (Development suspended) Some of my other activity:
